org.gbif.crawler.xml.crawlserver.listener

Class ResultPersistingListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gbif.crawler.AbstractCrawlListener<ScientificNameRangeCrawlContext,String,List<Byte>>
      • org.gbif.crawler.xml.crawlserver.listener.ResultPersistingListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CrawlListener<ScientificNameRangeCrawlContext,String,List<Byte>>

    public class ResultPersistingListener
extends AbstractCrawlListener<ScientificNameRangeCrawlContext,String,List<Byte>>
    This Crawl Listener will persist every single response we receive to disk. It will do so in sub folders of the given base path in a format like this: ////___.response
